name: The Box Capture
description:
Welcome to The Box Capture where you are a cat and much capture the box up to 5000 points. When you reach 5000 points you win.
W,A,S,D is to move

Known problems:

Sometimes you don't move right away so try closing the program and try again

You will automatically begin to get points at a rapid pace

From time to time you may not get the points, still trying to find a way to get so even at close distance.
